name: Green Power Bowl
description: Get ready to power up your plate with this vegetarian, protein-packed chickpea and edamame Bowl! This meal is a high-energy powerhouse, blending protein, fiber, and healthy fats for a complete and satisfying experience. But the real showstopper? Our bold and fresh dressing steals the spotlight, infusing every bite with vibrant flavors that make this bowl as delicious as it is nutritious.

ingredients.name: Sesame Ginger Dressing Mix or Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
Sesame Ginger Dressing or Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing
low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce

preparation: Stir together rice, water, and seasoning in Multipurpose Steamer. Top with tray; microwave uncovered, on high, 16–18 min.
Meanwhile, drain and rinse chickpeas. Place in bowl with edamame, lime juice, and seasoning. Toss to combine.
Cut cucumber into rounds. Slice avocado.

Once cooked, divide half of rice between four bowls; reserve remaining rice for use at a later date.  Arrange chickpea mixture, cucumbers, avocado, snow peas, and lettuce in bowls. Drizzle dressing on top; add additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Use remaining rice to make burritos the next day.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: SPG Seasoning
summary: Salt. Pepper. Garlic. Your go-to for chicken, fish, seafood, roasted potatoes, veggies, & even popcorn!

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
